mType.description: IQMESH Network management - Write TR configuration request.

msgId.description: Message identification for binding request with response.

repeat.description: Number of repetitions of DPA messages.

restart.description: Restart required after writing the configuration.

deviceAddr.description: Device address(es) to write the configuration to. Broadcast address is also allowed.

rfChannelA.description: Main RF channel A of the main network. Valid numbers depend on used RF band.

rfChannelB.description: Same as above but second B channel. Used at RFPGM only.

rfSubChannelA.description: Main RF channel A of the optional subordinate network in case the node also plays a role of the coordinator of such network. Valid numbers depend on used RF band.

rfSubChannelB.description: Same as above but second B channel.

lpRxTimeout.description: Timeout for receiving RF packets at LP mode at N device.

rfPgmAltChannel.description: A nonzero value specifies an alternative DPA service mode channel.

rfPgmEnableAfterReset.description: If sets, then activates RFPGM invoking by TR module reset.

rfPgmTerminateAfter1Min.description: If sets, then terminates RFPGM automatically ~1 minute after reset.

rfPgmTerminateMcuPin.description: If sets, then terminates RFPGM by dedicated pin of the TR module.

rfPgmDualChannel.description: If sets, then enables single or dual channel function.

rfPgmLpMode.description: RFPGM receiving mode setting. If set, then LP (low power) Rx mode is used during RFPGM. Otherwise STD (standard) Rx mode is used.

rfPgmIncorrectUpload.description: Read only. Indicates that the last RFPGM has successfully been completed.

customDpaHandler.description: If set, then a Custom DPA handler is called in case of an event.

nodeDpaInterface.description: If set, then Node device can be controlled by a SPI or UART interface.

uartBaudrate.description: Baud rate of the UART interface if one is used.

dpaAutoexec.description: If set, then DPA Autoexec is run at a later stage of the module boot time.

routingOff.description: If set, then the Node device does not route packets on the background.

ioSetup.description: If set, then DPA IO Setup is run at an early stage of the module boot time.

peerToPeer.description: If set, then device receives also peer-to-peer (non-networking) packets and raises PeerToPeer event.

securityPassword.description: It sets security password. If the field is left completely empty (no characters filled), the default password (16x number 0x00) is used (the same as the default set from the factory.

securityUserKey.description: It sets security user key. Enter a value up to 16 characters.

returnVerbose.description: Flag that includes additional parameters in the response.
